features: Trio of Tastes: Whether you crave the tanginess of lime, the refreshing burst of spearmint, or the fruity sweetness of strawberry, this pack has a flavour to match every mood and moment.
Gentle Whitening: Each variant is formulated with baking soda, known for its natural teeth brightening properties, to help gently remove surface stains and reveal a whiter smile.
Alcohol-Free Freshness: Our mouthwash is free from alcohol, ensuring a soothing cleanse that leaves your mouth feeling refreshed without dryness.
Effective and Enjoyable: The combination of fun flavours with a touch of menthol provides an effective oral hygiene routine that is also a pleasurable experience.
Perfect for Travel: The small 2Fl Oz bottles are TSA-friendly and perfect for maintaining fresh breath whether you're at home or on the move.
Environmentally Conscious: HM - Smile Clear is dedicated to sustainability, offering a product that is as kind to the earth as it is to your mouth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works fine. No problem with the taste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This alcohol free mouthwash is very effective at freshening breath, and is gentle on the soft tissue of my mouth. I love the lime and mint flavor, though it is a bit heavier on the cinnamon taste than I expected. This mouthwash is easy to dispense into the upper collection bulb, by squeezing the bottle and letting the liquid flow upwards. The caps stay secure through movement, and the small bottles are great for travel.This mouthwash leaves my mouth feeling tingly fresh without the harsh, drying effects of other mouthwashes- many make me feel like I've swished with paint stripper.This mouthwash is the best one I've used, and the freshness lasts for hours. It quickly eliminates coffee breath, makes my mouth feel and smell like I've just chewed mint gum, and the inside of my mouth feels clean and comfortable.HM - Smile Clear Concentrated Alcohol Free Mouthwash, Advanced Dental Care-Smart Ingredients,for Bad Breath, whitening Teeth, Healthy Gums (Lime, Pack of 3 (3x2Fl Oz)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great fun alternative to alcohol mouthwashes
reviews.reviewText: I stumbled upon these HM Smile Clear mouthwash bottles while looking for an alcohol-free option, and I'm pleasantly surprised! It comes in a mixed pack. The spearmint is my favorite, fresh and minty, while the lime is a zingy twist, and the strawberry is sweet and fruity. They all leave my breath feeling clean and refreshed, without that burning alcohol sensation.The concentrated formula is cool too - a little goes a long way, so the bottles last ages. Plus, I love that they're eco-friendly and cruelty-free. Overall, a great find for anyone looking for a gentle, effective mouthwash with some fun flavors. Just be aware, the spearmint is definitely the strongest of the three.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Concentrated mouthwash three pack
reviews.reviewText: This three-pack of concentrated alcohol-free mouthwash is very unique. You basically mix one part of this to 10 to 20 parts of water to make an effective mouthwash. The neck of the bottle has little measurements on it to help you measure. It does not come with another container to put it in so you will need a little cup, or to mix the entire contents into a used mouthwash bottle or a jar. It may take a little math and trial and error to figure out the exact formula that you desire. The liquid has effective germ killing ingredients without alcohol. You can definitely taste it when mixed one part to 20, but you may want stronger flavor. Having to mix the product with water is a little bit inconvenient, however these little bottles will be perfect for traveling, and overall are more environmentally friendly then a large bottle. My husband and I both like the flavors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Bottle is convenient but tastes horrible
reviews.reviewText: The bottle was a nice design but the strawberry and lime flavors tasted like cough syrup. The mint tasted ok but was not the best

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent, but don’t use it full strength!
reviews.reviewText: The 3-pack alcohol-free mouthwash offers a variety of unique flavors, adding a refreshing twist to the oral care routine. The convenient size makes it easy to carry, ensuring freshness on the go. The concentrated strength of the mouthwash is a pro for those seeking powerful results. However, a word of caution – it's crucial to dilute the product before use, as the concentrated form can be unpleasant when used straight. Once diluted, the mouthwash proves to be an effective and flavorful addition to daily oral hygiene, making it a solid choice for those who prefer alcohol-free options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't burn my mouth and has a nice mild mint taste
reviews.reviewText: It's a good concentrate of mouthwash. You can up the intensity of the mouthwash by adding less water to the concentrate. I prefer to use it as a mild concentrate. It has a nice mild mint flavor that does not burn my mouth. Keeps my breath fresh. The only thing I didn't like was that I had to have an extra little cup so I would be able to mix the concentrate and water together. That is just a minor issue. The mouthwash works as intended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for traveling
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect travel! Particularly for flying compact and concentrated! The mouthwash is 100% as expected works well and refreshing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Very Interesting Flavor – Different, But Leaves the Mouth Feeling Fresh
reviews.reviewText: Since this mouthwash is a concentrate, it has a thicker consistency than any mouthwash I have ever used before, and has to be mixed with water before use. In some ways that is good because you can control the strength and intensity. It does mean you have to use a cup with this one since it doesn’t come with one. Most mouthwashes have a cup shaped lid that can be used as a cup for rinsing. This brand however does NOT include a lid large enough to be used as a cup, which was the main reason I dropped a star. I don’t normally use a cup, so I have to remember to keep one in the bathroom to use with this mouthwash.This does have a fabulously fresh taste though, it is different, and takes some getting used to. But it made my mouth feel amazingly clean after rinsing. It has a zingy, citrus zest mixed with rosemary kind of taste. I wasn’t too sure at first, because the freshness doesn’t fully hit for a few minutes after spitting it out. Once the freshness strikes though, it is really nice.Overall, I am happy with the quality of this mouthwash. You get a lot for your money; I just wish the lids could be used as a cup. They do include a bonus travel sized atomizer bottle though, for freshness on the go 😊.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Refreshing flavours, alcohol-free formula, smart ingredients, concentration, practical packaging.
reviews.reviewText: The standout feature of this mouthwash trio is its refreshing variety of flavours. The mixed pack, including Lime, Spearmint, and Strawberry, adds a delightful twist to my daily oral care routine. The burst of flavours not only invigorates my senses but also makes the mouthwash experience surprisingly enjoyable.The alcohol-free formula is a game-changer. Unlike traditional mouthwashes that can be harsh, this formula is gentle on my mouth while still delivering advanced dental care. The absence of alcohol ensures a comfortable experience without the burning sensation, making it suitable for daily use.The packaging is not only aesthetically pleasing but also functional. The flip-top caps are easy to use, preventing any unnecessary spills or leaks. The small size of each bottle makes them convenient to store in various spaces, from bathroom cabinets to travel toiletry bags.The trio pack is a thoughtful offering. Having three distinct flavours allows for a rotation based on mood or preference, and the variety adds an element of fun to what is typically considered a mundane routine. It's a small detail that enhances the overall user experience.In conclusion, this trio has become a staple in my daily oral care regimen. The refreshing flavours, alcohol-free formula, smart ingredients, concentration, practical packaging, and the variety in the trio pack make it a standout choice for anyone seeking a delightful and effective mouthwash. If you're on the lookout for a game-changing oral care experience, this trio is bound to put a smile on your face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The pack of 3 HM - Smile Clear Concentrated Alcohol Free Mouthwash is OK, not the best tasting Mouthwash. You have to dilute with water which in my opinion takes away alot of the flavour. I'm not over keen on the flavour and it actually tastes very bland ( yes I added right amount of water) compared to ready to use Mouthwash.Would be ideal for people who don't like strong minty Mouthwash

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Good for people who don't like regular mouthwash
reviews.reviewText: I think that for people who don't like regular mouth wash or struggle with the strong flavour, this would be great for them because it's very subtle flavour and doesn't have an overly powerful taste. The issue is for me that I felt less fresh as a result and I really missed my usual powerful minty freshness. They are a little bit harder to use than regular mouthwash to as you have to mix them with water as they're a concentrate and I don't want to spend the time measuring exact amounts twice a day so estimation is all I would be doing on a long term basis. The flavours aren't bad but they also aren't my favourite. I feel like for me it's best to stick with my regular but I can see the appeal for some. The bottles are also super small which is a great space saver in the bathroom!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the idea of these but in practice they're not as convenient as non concentrated mouthwash. It's not difficult but for a lazy person like me it's still a bit of a faff.The taste is mild, even at the correct dilution it tastes watered down. I know it is watered down but it's noticeable, I think it could be stronger. The strawberry one tastes very much like my daughters children's mouthwash it's that mild.They do leave a fresh / clean feeling after using them though which is good. I've rated 5 stars because the only negative is really just a reflection of my laziness. It actually does what it says, cuts down on plastic waste and is a good option for travelling so I thought 5 stars was appropriate on that basis.
